title: Herédia (Sebastião de)
body: By decree of December 30, 1914, he was appointed civil governor of Madeira, having taken office on January 8, 1915. He was appointed civil governor of this district for the second time by decree of May 24, 1915, and took office on July 22 of the same year.

1914: Appointment as civil governor of Madeira
1915: Second appointment as civil governor of this district
